acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO)

business_details.Business: Judgment delivered. Accused Bipul Ray  and Phanidhar Ray are acquitted. Accused Bani Kanta Ray is sentenced to undergo R.I for 7 (Seven ) years with fine of Rs.1000.00in default S.I for 1 (One)months and he is also sentenced to R.I of LIFE with fine of Rs. 5000.00 in default R.O for another 2 (Two) months.
